resources.string: The objective of the game is to score as many points as possible before the deck runs out of cards. Scores less than 75 points are not submitted to High Scores.

Press on the deck to draw a card. If the card drawn is a face card (10s are face cards), it will automatically go to its Position. If the card drawn is any other card it will automatically go to the Black or Red Box based on its color.

The Black and Red boxes can only contain one card at a time. For example, if a Red number card is drawn but there is already a Red card in the Red Box, you must either discard the drawn Red number card or discard the card in the Red Box.

To score points, the Pile must contain one face card of each suit (one club, one diamond, one spade, and one heart) based on the current level, starting with Jack. Points are not scored until a level is completed. Having a complete Pile will move you to the next level.

To Collect a face card into the Pile, you must have the following cards on the board (example shown above): The face card you want to Collect into the Pile, a number card in one of the color Boxes which matches the suit of the face card, and another number card in the other color Box. Once all of these cards are on the board, press the face card in its position to Collect it and move that card onto the Pile. Face cards that can be Collected are surrounded with a dark border. The sum of the number cards used to Collect a face card is put towards your Pile total.
Wild Face Cards as Face Cards

Once a level has been completed, the face cards from that level become Wild. Wild face cards can be Collected into the Pile instead of face cards of the current level. Wild face cards which can be Collected as face cards are surrounded with a dark border. Wild face cards have the same prerequisites as the current level face cards to be collected onto the pile. 10s start the game as Wild.
Wild Face Cards as Number Cards

Wild face cards can also be used as number cards. To use a Wild face card as a number card, press on that card and it will move to its respective color Box. Wild face cards that can be used as number cards will be surrounded with a lighter border. Pressing a Wild face card will only move it to its respective color Box if that Wild face card cannot Collected into the Pile as a face card instead.
If you wish to skip the level you are currently on, press the BREAK button. Skipping a level will break the face cards of that level. You can only use the BREAK button once per game.
Once a level has been Broken, the face cards from that level cannot be Collected. The face cards from the Broken level cannot be used as Wild face cards.
